summary: Advance All Skills As If You Had Done It Yourself.
descriptionHtml:
I Only Made This Because I Have Played Skyrim So Much I Did Actually Manage To Get All Skills On My Altmer To Level 100 And I Wanted To Restart The Game With A New Race And Everything Unlocked. 

Literally Place This File Into Your Skyrim Folder (Next To \" TESV.exe \"), Then Go Into Game, Open Up The Console And Put \" bat AdvanceSkills \".

All Skills Go Up To Level 100 As If You Had Done It Yourself In-Game; You Still Have To Spend The 80 Or So Perk Points And Choose To Improve Magicka / Health / Stamina.
author: Els236
